channel.title: Moparmon -- Community Game!
channel.description:
After querying ideas from MoparScape.org for a community-made game, we have settled on a remake of Pokemon called Moparmon. Moparmon is going to encapsulate all the original mechanics and aspects of the gameboy Pokemon games, but we will develop our own "Moparmons," cities, badges, etc. This is going to be a rather large effort over the next few months, where anyone and everyone is able and encouraged to contribute. Right now, my idea is to dedicate a Moparmon to everyone who is involved in the project in some way.
This thread is a master thread of the cumulative progress of the game. There will be other threads to focus on each component of the game, including the engine, design, graphics, sounds, etc. These threads will be created in due time, and linked to from this thread.
Currently, Frell and I have decided upon starting development of the game sometime in late October, but look for topics to start designing the game later this week. Post any feedback/suggestions you have now! It's an early project, so now's the best time to request major concepts and ideas that, later on, would be more impractical to implement. ;)

item.title: Moparmon -- Community Game!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Sweet!
Tell me, will it be a game like Pokenation?
Online, etc.
Would be sweet, looked up to that game, but sadly never was released, Good luck to you guys either way

Read full topic

item.title: Moparmon -- Community Game!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Wintercanon, post:9, topic:414445”]Since it’s 2D, will you be using Slick or a custom engine? Also as for resolution will it be fullscreen toggleable, a set frame size or the same aspect as the Gameboy screen?

[quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=516408.msg3748446#msg3748446 date=1315860651]
Needs a perverted guy with squinting eyes who tries to get with every girl he sees.
[/quote]Will he also be blasian?[/quote]

Yes, it’ll be using slick. As for the resolution, I’m thinking we’ll diverge from the old gameboy resolution, and focus more on supporting multiple display modes. Fullscreen will be supported.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparmon -- Community Game!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

please for the love of god no item duping and missing numbers.

All changes and moparmon will be rational, don’t worry.

Triton:

Please be more original. Can everyone only think of Pokemon clones?

We did this on purpose, itd be a fun experience having the community design every moparmon and town and remake one of the best games of all time.

Read full topic
